title: Super column
summary: A super column is a tuple (a pair) with a binary super column name and a value that maps it to many columns.[1] They consist of a keyâ€“value pairs, where the values are columns. Theoretically speaking, super columns are (sorted) associative array of columns.[2] Similar to a regular column family where a row is a sorted map of column names and column values, a row in a super column family is a sorted map of super column names that maps to column names and column values.
